name: Rooftop BMX Bicycle Stunt Rider - Cycle Simulation
name_original: Rooftop BMX Bicycle Stunt Rider - Cycle Simulation
description:
Do you love bicycle games? Welcome to new 3D bicycle game of 2017 where you have a chance to ride a cycle on Skyscraper rooftops of New York city. As a real stuntman ride a bicycle on crazy wheels to Perform stunts on ramps and complete all bicycle parking missions. While performing crazy jumps on rooftops of dangerous building avoid the obstacles. This is a new Simulation of Cycle Game in which you will have to cycle across city buildings, jump on big ramps, half pipes and mad tracks. Be a daredevil cyclist to enjoy the awesome skyscraper ride by paddling BMX bicycle on rooftop.

Riding a mountain bike on dangerous skyscraper roofs is not that easy while climbing up or climbing down you have to take care of cycle race, big jumps, acceleration, brakes, paddle speed, thrilling ramps and steering. Fast speed may not always be required at some hurdles you need to be slow down by applying brakes. Stay happy on crazy wheels, control your mountain cycle and park the bicycle on parking lots by crossing all twisted city tracks. Become best stuntman bicycle rider 2017. Extreme rooftop bicycle adventure will bring you the craziest bicycle riding ever!

To all bicycle riders happy bicycle race on crazy wheels!
